item.title: What exactly is data science anyways?
item.description: Once upon a time there was a little girl with a big personality and an even bigger imagination. Attracted to the weird and unusual, she preferred her own intuitions to inflexible instructions and always asked adults hard questions (but, why!?). Fast-forward to adulthood and it’s no wonder I ended up in data science. Like “DevOps” several years before it, “Data Science” has become yet another trendy, ambiguous tech industry term. What I find intriguing is that “Data Science” is a tech industry term that expands beyond the traditional boundaries of the technology industry.
